refnamediv.refpurpose: check whether a handler exists for a particular client extension type

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int SSL_CTX_has_client_custom_ext(const SSL_CTX *ctx, unsigned int ext_type);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_CTX_has_client_custom_ext() checks whether a handler has been set for a client extension of type ext_type using SSL_CTX_add_client_custom_ext().

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: Returns 1 if a handler has been set, 0 otherwise.
